title: How to make a truck
brief_description: Looks at the relatively small scale manufacture of trucks for specialized applications in the United States. Provides a simple but comprehensive explanation of the assembly line and the entire process of truck production.
description: Looks at the relatively small scale manufacture of trucks for specialized applications in the United States. Provides a simple but comprehensive explanation of the assembly line and the entire process of truck production.
